title: LOL REQUIREMENTS
body: League won't connect to server at all and its not my internet because other computers work on this internet with league its just this one, so can people please comment from start to finish what i NEED on my computer to be able to log into league

replies.body:
That sounds like a connection issue, not a problem with your computer specs. Your computer could have a weird configuration with the way it's connected to the internet and that's what preventing you from logging in (I know that League doesn't like automatically retrieved DNS addresses, which is the default setting for most network adapters).

Just fyi though, here are the official minimum requirements: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654
